GisIoObjectStreamReader< T > Class Template Reference

#include <ObjectStreamReader.h>

Inherits GisIStreamReaderTmpl< T >< T >.

Inheritance diagram for GisIoObjectStreamReader< T >:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class GisIoObjectStreamReader< T >

GisIoObjectStreamReader is the template for all readers on GisIoStream. Readers for various sized objects or primitive types can be based on this class.

Definition at line 29 of file ObjectStreamReader.h.


Public Member Functions

virtual GIS_API GisInt64 GetIndex ()
 Gets the current stream position. Position is measured by number of items from the stream start.
virtual GIS_API GisInt64 GetLength ()
 Gets the stream length.
virtual GIS_API GisInt32 ReadNext (GisArray< T > *&buffer, const GisInt32 offset=0, const GisInt32 count=-1)
 Reads in the next block of items. Use ReadNext( buffer) to read in the entire stream. The caller is responsible to create/dispose the GisArray.
virtual GIS_API GisInt32 ReadNext (T *buffer, const GisInt32 offset=0, const GisInt32 count=-1)
 Reads in the next block of items. Use ReadNext( buffer) to read in the entire stream. The caller is responsible to allocate a buffer large enough to store data.
virtual GIS_API void Reset ()
 Reset the current index to the stream start. Allows re-reading.
virtual GIS_API void Skip (const GisInt32 offset)
 Skips a number of items.
